name: Old(ish) style reblog lists on Tumblr
description:
Tumblr recently made an update that changes the way comments added in previous reblogs are displayed. It's awful, and it makes it very hard to determine who wrote what at a glance.

This extension puts it back the way it was, as far as possible.
additional_info:
What this extension does, in detail:

  • Removes the tiny avatars from each reblog.
  • Puts a grey bar alongside each reblog, just like a blockquote.
  • Adds a colon after the name of the person who reblogged. ('someone:' rather than 'someone')
  • Removes the horizontal lines between each reblog.
  • Makes some adjustments for positioning.

I've tested it so far against the material my own dash. There may be elements I haven't caught, such as embedded videos.
